privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: We are committed to protecting the privacy of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how our application collects, uses, shares, and protects your information, in accordance with Google Play Store requirements.
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.title: 1. Data Collected
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of data to ensure the functioning of the application:
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.name: Name: Collected for the functioning of the application. Users can choose not to provide this information.
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.email: Email address: Collected for the functioning of the application and account management. This data is required and cannot be disabled.
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.messages: Other messages via the application: Collected to enable messaging features integrated into the application.
privacyPolicy.dataCollected.sensitive: No sensitive data such as racial or ethnic origins, political or religious beliefs, or sexual orientation is collected or shared.
privacyPolicy.useOfData.title: 2. Use of Data
privacyPolicy.useOfData.intro: The collected data is used for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.useOfData.operation: Application Operation: Enable access to the main features of the application.
privacyPolicy.useOfData.management: Account Management: Facilitate the creation and management of user accounts, including authentication.
privacyPolicy.dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
privacyPolicy.dataSharing.intro: We do not share the collected personal data (name, email address, other messages) with third parties, except in the following cases:
privacyPolicy.dataSharing.legal: When necessary to comply with a legal obligation.
privacyPolicy.dataSharing.security: To protect the security of the application and prevent fraud.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity.content: All collected data is encrypted during transfer to ensure its security. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
privacyPolicy.userControl.title: 5. User Control Over Their Data
privacyPolicy.userControl.content:
Name: Users can choose not to provide this information, except when necessary for certain features.

Email address: Email collection is required for account management and cannot be disabled.

Ephemeral data: Collected data is not processed ephemerally, unless otherwise indicated.
privacyPolicy.contact.title: 9. Contact
privacyPolicy.contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights over your data, please contact us via the account deletion form mentioned above or consult our user support.
privacyPolicy.footer: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Any updates will be published on this page, with an indication of the date of last modification.

event.gifts.title: Gift Suggestions
event.gifts.generateMessage: Generate personalized gift suggestions for this event?
event.gifts.regenerateMessage: This will replace all current gift suggestions with new ones. Continue?
event.gifts.noSuggestionsDesc: Gift suggestions will be generated automatically when this event is created with the gift flow.
home.giftSearch: I'm looking for the perfect gift
giftEvent.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this gift suggestion?

giftSuggestion.name: Gift Name
giftSuggestion.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe why this gift would be perfect
giftSuggestion.aiDescription: Describe the gift you'd like to generate. Our AI will create a personalized suggestion based on the event context.
giftSuggestion.promptPlaceholder: e.g., A tech gadget under €100 that would be useful for remote work
giftSuggestion.promptRequired: Please describe what kind of gift you want to generate
